name: Omega 3 Fish Oil
description: Scientific studies have found that fish oil can help to prevent and kill various cancers, including colon, prostate and breast. (13a) Not only has research proven that it makes conventional cancer drugs more effective, but it’s also an effective stand-alone therapy in natural cancer treatment.

name: 骨膠原
description: 功效：1. 加速软骨细胞的修复和再生，提供关节建造、修补、软骨组织、肌腱、韧带的主要材料 2. 刺激软骨弹性组织的修复、再造、预防软骨失去弹性 3. 控制滑膜分泌液的平衡，避免关节萎缩 4. 减轻关节发炎，舒解神经炎、韧带炎、肌腱炎
